name: The Merchant Raft
description:
Explore a ruined underwater city and collect supplies to trade and upgrade your merchant raft. 

WSAD move

TAB to bring up pause menu, return to surface, and trade menu.

E to turn on you light (only works in underwater scene)

hold L Shift to increase walk/swim speed

Q to drink energy drink (refined version only)

Bag icon used in the UI: Money bag icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

Soda bottle icon: Soda icons created by Good Ware - Flaticon
